title: jaya jaya karuNAkara
sahitya:
jaya jaya karuNAkara jaya jaya kamala nayana jaya jaya jaya kambukaNTha kaustubha dharane
jaya jaya jaya shrI vallabha jaya jaya jaya shrI vatsala jaya jaya jaya sindhu shayana mandara dharane
jaya jaya jaya makara kuNDala dharane jaya jaya jaya shanka cakra gadAdharane
jaya jaya jaya jagannAtha shambhuvirinci prIta pada padumanAbha AnandAnata guNagaNa nilaya
AnandAnanta ravi shshi tEja jaya jaya jaya namO purandara viTTala
